item.title: Whisper Writer_for_dictation
item.description: Install WhisperWriter on Windows 1 2 D:\Documents> git clone https://github.com/savbell/whisper-writer.git D:\Documents> cd whisper-writer Read the README.md file, and follow the installation instruction like this: Install python and create virtual environment. I used miniconda, but you can just download the package of v3.11 and install it directly to Windows.
